c74object.name: fftz.cavoc27~
c74object.description: Spectra are generated by an 27-rule cellular automaton.

method.name: capture_spectrum
method.description: Sample input spectrum and use that as a tuning basis. Turned on when flag is non-zero.

method.name: fftinfo
method.description: Print FFT information to Max window.

method.name: freeze
method.description: Freezes input spectrum. Turned on when flag is non-zero.

method.name: interpolate
method.description: Interpolates bewteen successive spectra. Turned on when flag is non-zero.

method.name: manual
method.description: Non-zero argument turns on flag. Then each new spectrum must be triggered manually with a bang.

method.name: oscbank
method.description: Non-zero flag switches to oscillator bank resynthesis.

method.name: retune
method.description: Retunes the spectrum (oscillator bank resynthesis only).

method.name: rule
method.description: A list of 27 integers (each valued 0, 1, or 2) defines the CA rule.

method.name: tranpose
method.description: Multiply all frequency components by transposition factor. (Oscillator bank resynthesis only.)

method.name: trigger
method.description: Trigger a new spectrum when manual flag is set.

attribute.name: density
attribute.description: Density of bins with energy in the starting spectrum. Valid values are between 0-1.

attribute.name: holdtime
attribute.description: Time in milliseconds between spectral updates
